TextLibrary.Text: So this is where you created your army of Undead? What is that device?
So this is where you created your army of Undead? What is that device?
So this is where you created your army of Undead? What is that device?
So this is where you created your army of Undead? What is that device?

Do you like it? I call it the Wheel of Pain. The Dark Dwarves of Kal-Ungar fashioned it for me. It inflicts such terrible suffering on a creature that when they die, their tortured soul rises again. Join with me and together we will use it to bend the Kings and Queens of all the lands to our will.

Do you like it? I call it the Wheel of Pain. The Dark Dwarves of Kal-Ungar fashioned it for me. It inflicts such terrible suffering on a creature that when they die, their tortured soul rises again. Join with me and together we will use it to bend the Kings and Queens of all the lands to our will.

Do you like it? I call it the Wheel of Pain. The Dark Dwarves of Kal-Ungar fashioned it for me. It inflicts such terrible suffering on a creature that when they die, their tortured soul rises again. Join with me and together we will use it to bend the Kings and Queens of all the lands to our will.

Do you like it? I call it the Wheel of Pain. The Dark Dwarves of Kal-Ungar fashioned it for me. It inflicts such terrible suffering on a creature that when they die, their tortured soul rises again. Join with me and together we will use it to bend the Kings and Queens of all the lands to our will.
When I finish with you, Bane, I'll strap YOU to the Wheel of Pain, and bend you to MY will.
